title: CF Montreal v Chicago Fire: Donadel and Waterman optimistic despite Philadelphia defeat
description: CF Montreal head coach Marco Donadel and defender Joel Waterman remained optimistic despite a defeat to the Philadelphia Union last time out. Montreal, who are bottom of the Eastern Conference, lost 2-1 to table-topping Philadelphia in a closely contested match in midweek. Montreal produced 1.5 expected goals (xG), slightly lower than the Union’s 1.6. Although […] The post CF Montreal v Chicago Fire: Donadel and Waterman optimistic despite Philadelphia defeat appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Tome lauds Spain super-sub Del Castillo after Switzerland showing
description: Spain head coach Montse Tome praised the impact of Athenea del Castillo in their 2-0 victory over Switzerland at Euro 2025. Second-half goals from Del Castillo and Claudia Pina helped the world champions reach the semi-finals of the competition for the first time since 1997. Spain squandered multiple chances in search of an opener, including […] The post Tome lauds Spain super-sub Del Castillo after Switzerland showing appeared first on Soccer News.
